data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bourguignon, Thomas, Leponce, Maurice, Roisin, Yves (2008): Revision of the Termitinae with snapping soldiers (Isoptera: Termitidae) from New Guinea. Zootaxa 1769: 1-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.182093
